[center][font size=4]Redis Change Log[/font][/center] [b]09.11.2015:[/b] Initial Release.
Container.Name: redis
Container.Description:
Redis is an open source, BSD licensed, advanced key-value cache and store. It is often referred to as a data structure server since keys can contain strings, hashes, lists, sets, sorted sets, bitmaps and hyperloglogs.[br] [br]
[br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : Storing all Redis config files [br]
Container.Overview: Redis is an open source, BSD licensed, advanced key-value cache and store. It is often referred to as a data structure server since keys can contain strings, hashes, lists, sets, sorted sets, bitmaps and hyperloglogs.
